phrases.phrase: Choose if you want to include or not images from albums.
Show captions on hover, or always hide?
Use a comma separated list to display images from selected categories e.g. 2,3,5,7. Set to 'all' to include all categories, 0 to exclude.
Any number. Number of images that are visible in the slider.
Any number. Number of images to be loaded (not all are visible).
Responsive will show more images at a smaller size at narrower browser widths, fixed will keep the number of images set in "Items" at the same size whatever the browser width.
Sets the styling so it will look like a sidebar block.
This is the width of each slide in the slider. The slides may not be exactly this width due to responsive design resizing them dynamically.
The title will be displayed at the head of the widget in the portal.
The type of the selection. You can set 'new' or 'rand' for random.

templates.template: <xen:include template="xengallery_media_block"> <xen:set var="$blockPhrase">{$configuration.xfmg_title}</xen:set> // Use either {xen:phrase xengallery_new_media}, {xen:phrase xengallery_random_media} or your own custom title <xen:set var="$blockId">XMGMediaForumListSidebar</xen:set> // This can be changed but must be something unique. <xen:set var="$type">{$configuration.xfmg_type}</xen:set> // You can set this to 'rand' for a random selection. <xen:set var="$items">{$configuration.items}</xen:set> // Any number. Number of images that are visible in the slider. <xen:set var="$limit">{$configuration.limit}</xen:set> // Any number. Number of images to be loaded (not all are visible). <xen:set var="$slideWidth">{$configuration.slideWidth}</xen:set> // This is the width of each slide in the slider. The slides may not be exactly this width due to responsive design resizing them dynamically. <xen:set var="$categories">{$configuration.categories}</xen:set> // Use a comma separated list to display images from selected categories e.g. 2,3,5,7. Set to 'all' to include all categories, 0 to exclude <xen:set var="$albums">{$configuration.albums}</xen:set> // Set to 1 to include images from albums, 0 to exclude <xen:set var="$isSidebarBlock">{$configuration.sidebarBlock}</xen:set> // Sets the styling so it will look like a sidebar block <xen:set var="$captions">{$configuration.captions}</xen:set> // Set to 1 to show captions on hover, set to 0 to always hide. <xen:set var="$noResponsive">{$configuration.responsive}</xen:set> // Set to 0 for responsive, 1 for fixed. Responsive will show more images at a smaller size at narrower browser widths, fixed will keep the number of images set in $items at the same size whatever the browser width. </xen:include>
